name: Schedule 15N-IoT and Blockchain Convergence With Industry Use Cases

messages.textToSpeech: How else can I help you ?
messages.displayText: Despite all the excitement around these technologies, we will offer a look at what they are, just as importantly what they are not, discuss with examples from travel industry specific use cases, and provide a look toward the future and emerging needs.

messages.speech: IoT is a vision where all manufactured things are connected to each other via wireless or wired communication networks. Blockchain is a digital, distributed and cryptographically secure record of all data transfer activities. This session will dig into how these two technologies are on a convergence course to yield cognitive systems for helping travelers by using data in innovative ways.
